document.full_text: the woman who accused two new york city police officers of rape says she was "devastated" last week by their acquittals, which she called "utterly disheartening".
document.title: accuser of new york police "devastated" by rape acquittals
lines_and_colors: the woman who accused two new york city police officers of rape says she was "devastated" last week by their acquittals, which she called "utterly disheartening".
